name: Futbol pocket - a simple way to play football soccer
name_original: Futbol pocket - a simple way to play football soccer
description:
Futbol pocket is a soccer game the likes of which the world has never seen! It uses amazing physics to simulate A TABLE SOCCER MATCH!

Objective:Get the greatest number of goals in the shortest possible time.

How to play:
- Get the balls to activate the goal
- Already activated the goal, go to the goal
- Get extra time in every goal, this varies according to your skill

Enjoy!!
